CustomField.formula: CASE(UserRole.Name, "Virtual Sales Rep – District 256", "ERTC,Medical,ESR,PBA,Individual Insurance", "Virtual Sales Rep – District 257", "ERTC,Medical,ESR,PBA,Individual Insurance", "Virtual Sales Rep – District 248", "Medical,Individual Insurance,Standalone POP,HPP Level 1", "Virtual Sales Rep – District 259", "Medical,Individual Insurance,Standalone POP,HPP Level 1", "Virtual Sales Rep – District 260", "Medical,Individual Insurance,Standalone POP,HPP Level 1", "Virtual Sales Rep – District 261", "Medical,Individual Insurance,Standalone POP,HPP Level 1", "Virtual Sales Rep – District 262", "Medical,Individual Insurance,Standalone POP", "Virtual Sales Rep – District 258", "Medical,Individual Insurance,Standalone POP,HPP Level 1", "")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is used to help determine which cadences a user has access to. If this has a value, the matching cadence should have one of the values. This is in addition to Cadence Type.
CustomField.label: Cadence Opportunity Type
